Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html#/s:18Advanc.name: bundleName

Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html#/s:18Advanc.name: displayName
Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html#/s:18Advanc.abstract: The name being displayed in the device. It will be nil if the display name cannot be retireved.

Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html#/s:18Advanc.name: version
Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html#/s:18Advanc.abstract: The short version string of the app, which is like 1.2.3. It will be nil if the version cannot be retrieved.

Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html#/s:18Advanc.name: buildNumber
Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html#/s:18Advanc.abstract: The build number of the app, which is anything defined by the user. It will be nil if the build number cannot be retrieved.

Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html.name: AppInfoAccessor
Classes/AppInfoAccessor.html.abstract: AppInfoAccessor provides the information about the app.

Classes/VersionHelper.html.name: VersionHelper
Classes/VersionHelper.html.abstract: VersionHelper compares the version of the app. The version should be as the format of 1.2.3 where the first number will be changed if the style of the application is changed, the second number will be changed if some main functions are changed and the third number will be changed whenever errors or functions are fixed or changed.

Classes/CoreDataHelper.html.name: CoreDataHelper
Classes/CoreDataHelper.html.abstract: CoreDataHelper is used to perform basic level core data interaction.

Classes/FileHelper.html.name: FileHelper
Classes/FileHelper.html.abstract: FileHelper is used to perform file related action.

Classes/FileInfoAccessor.html.name: FileInfoAccessor
Classes/FileInfoAccessor.html.abstract: FileInfoAccessor gets information related to a file.

Classes/PathHelper.html.name: PathHelper
Classes/PathHelper.html.abstract: PathHelper is used to perform path related action.

Classes/Logger.html.name: Logger
Classes/Logger.html.abstract: Logger is used to format a log.

Classes/NetworkHelper.html.name: NetworkHelper
Classes/NetworkHelper.html.abstract: NetowrkHelper is used to perform basic level internet connection.

Classes/JSONParser.html.name: JSONParser
Classes/JSONParser.html.abstract: JSONParser parses the data of a JSON structure.

Classes/ResourceHelper.html.name: ResourceHelper
Classes/ResourceHelper.html.abstract: ResourceHelper improves the ability to access resources.

Classes/TextResourceHelper.html.name: TextResourceHelper
Classes/TextResourceHelper.html.abstract: TextResourceHelper provides support for a text resource file.
